QAData.question: Who won between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Leicester City on Sun, 23 Oct 2022 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City won 4–0 over Wolverhampton Wanderers on Sun, 23 Oct 2022 13:00:00 GMT.
